title: Prince Andrew’s Twitter Profile, Instagram Account Shut Down
sub_head: The move comes after Queen Elizabeth stripped the prince of titles; his YouTube channel is also inaccessible
body:
Some of Prince Andrew’s social-media accounts have been deactivated, days after Queen Elizabeth stripped him of his military affiliations and patronages amid a legal battle over sexual-abuse allegations.
The prince’s Twitter profile, Instagram account and YouTube channel were inaccessible Thursday afternoon. His Facebook page was live but the last post was from 2020.
